main event: An observer reported seeing an elliptical object moving in the sky in Palmetto, Florida.
interesting points: The object was initially described as a spacecraft or UFO,It was elliptical in shape, white or silver in color, and about 75 to 100 feet in diameter,The observer estimated the object's speed to be slightly more than that of a jet airliner,Visibility conditions were reported as cloudy with no apparent moon,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 to 3 minutes before the object disappeared below the horizon.
witness description: a 64-year-old male who frequently observes the sky at night.
